TestDescription.name: WordPress MailPoet Newsletters (wysija-newsletters) unauthenticated file upload
TestDescription.Description: The WordPress plugin "MailPoet Newsletters" (wysija-newsletters) before version 2.6.8 is vulnerable to an unauthenticated file upload. An attacker can use the Upload Theme functionality to upload a zip file containing a PHP shell.
TestDescription.Impact: It may be possible for an attacker to use this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Upgrade to the latest version of MailPoet Newsletters (this issue was fixed in version 2.6.8).

Reference.database: Remote File Upload Vulnerability in WordPress MailPoet Plugin (wysija-newsletters)
WordPress MailPoet Newsletters (wysija-newsletters) Unauthenticated File Upload
